meanings.definition: A chronic skin condition characterized by red patches covered with white scales.
meanings.sent1: My uncle has psoriasis on his arms and legs.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist diagnosed her with psoriasis after examining her skin.
meanings.sent3: Even though it's not contagious, his psoriasis makes him look like a walking snowstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her psoriasis is like nature's way of painting her skin with red and white hues.
meanings.sent5: The white scales of psoriasis on his back resembled tiny snowflakes falling on his skin.

meanings.definition: The presence of psoriasis on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The psoriasis on her face made her self-conscious in public.
meanings.sent2: He covered the psoriasis on his arms with long sleeves.
meanings.sent3: The psoriasis on his skin seemed to have a mind of its own, appearing in unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: The psoriasis on her skin was like a stubborn guest that refused to leave the party.
meanings.sent5: The red patches of psoriasis on his legs stood out like a sore thumb among his smooth skin.

meanings.sent1: She worries that her children might inherit the tendency to psoriasis from her.
meanings.sent2: He has been psoriasis-free for years after following a strict skincare routine.
meanings.sent3: His friends jokingly call him the 'psoriasis magnet' because he always seems to attract it.
meanings.sent4: The stress of work often causes him to psoriasis more frequently.
meanings.sent5: Despite his efforts, he couldn't avoid psoriasis flaring up during stressful times.
